Java SE 15 & JDK 15

Uses of Interface
javax.swing.ComboBoxEditor

Packages that use ComboBoxEditor
Package Description
javax.swing
Provides a set of "lightweight" (all-Java language) components that, to the maximum degree possible, work the same on all platforms.
javax.swing.plaf.basic
Provides user interface objects built according to the Basic look and feel.
javax.swing.plaf.metal
Provides user interface objects built according to the Java look and feel (once codenamed Metal), which is the default look and feel.

  • Uses of ComboBoxEditor in javax.swing

    Fields in javax.swing declared as ComboBoxEditor
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected ComboBoxEditor JComboBox.editor
    This protected field is implementation specific.
    Methods in javax.swing that return ComboBoxEditor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ComboBoxEditor JComboBox.getEditor()
    Returns the editor used to paint and edit the selected item in the JComboBox field.
    Methods in javax.swing with parameters of type ComboBoxEditor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void JComboBox.configureEditor​(ComboBoxEditor anEditor, Object anItem)
    Initializes the editor with the specified item.
    void JComboBox.setEditor​(ComboBoxEditor anEditor)
    Sets the editor used to paint and edit the selected item in the JComboBox field.

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BasicComboBoxEditor
    The default editor for editable combo boxes.

    A subclass of BasicComboBoxEditor that implements UIResource.
    Methods in javax.swing.plaf.basic that return ComboBoxEditor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected ComboBoxEditor BasicComboBoxUI.createEditor()
